Language.name: English
Language.string: Elite villager
Hardy villager that gathers coin quickly, but other natrual resources more slowly. Armed with dynamite for a powerful splash attack. Good against infantry but weak against cavalry.
Language.String: Cheap scout building with no attack.
Language.string: Great Temple
Great Temple
Sacred temple of the Inca. Trickles wood over time automatically.
Town Center attack increased, and you receive a shipment of 6 Minutemen for each Town Center and Fort you have built. This shipment arrives more quickly.
Longbowman range increased and they deal increased damage to Heavy Infantry.
Crates of 400 Food
12 Grenadiers
Powerful Indian heavy musket infantry that has a large bonus versus cavalry at melee.
Ages up very fast and allows Jungle Outposts to receive shipments
Language.String:
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Civilization bonus:</color>
Kancha Houses spawn 2 Llamas when built. Llamas can be tasked at the community plaza at a less efficient rate than villagers. Starts with a free Chasqui who can construct Tambos; powerful Trading Posts which villagers can garrison in, and receives an additional Chasqui every Age. Military units can garrison in Kallankas and Strongholds. Native Allies shipments are cheaper and arrive more quickly
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Unique units:</color>
Chasqui, Plumed Spearman, Chimu Runner, Jungle Bowman, Bolas Warrior, Huaraca, Maceman, Warrior Priestess and Chincha Raft.
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Unique buildings:</color>
Kallanka, Stronghold, Kancha House and Tambo
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Unique ceremonies:</color>
Moon Ceremony and Supay Ceremony

A vast South American empire known for the power of its walls and smart administration.
Language.string: Ages up very fast and allows Jungle Outposts to receive shipments
Ages up very fast and allows Jungle Outposts to receive shipments
Ages up very fast and allows Jungle Outposts to receive shipments
Ages up very fast and allows Jungle Outposts to receive shipments
1 villager, 100 wood, 1 Fat Llama
2 villagers, 200 wood, 2 Fat Llamas
3 villagers, 300 wood, 3 Fat Llamas
6 villagers, 600 wood, 6 Fat Llamas
1 Town Center Travois and 1 Builder Travois
1 Stronghold Travois, 1 Builder Travois, and +1 Stronghold built limit
2 Stronghold Travois and +2 Stronghold built limit
1 Farm Travois, Great Feast, and Harvest Ceremony
Forest Spirit Ceremony and 2 Cloud Forest Travois
2 Builder Travois, Earth Gift Ceremony, and Green Corn Ceremony
3 Builder Travois and Excessive Tribute
2 Warrior Priestesses
3 Macemen
8 Macemen
Tambos are cheaper and stronger.
Ranged warrior who hurls bolas for a wide area of effect. The bola slows down enemies. Good against cavalry in melee.
Powerful hand infantry that inflicts armor-piercing splash damage with a large bludgeon. Good against buildings and infantry.
Anti-building shock infantry. Good against artillery and skirmishers.
Anti-building and anti-skirmisher shock infantry that deals melee damage from a distance.
2 Warrior Priestesses
TEAM livestock and pets move much more quickly. Healers, scouts, and civilians gain a reduced bonus.
6 Warrior Priestesses
Elite Warrior Priestess
INF Elite Warrior Priestess
Assassin healer
Elite Inca healer. Highly effective against mercenaries, Explorers, War Chiefs, and Monks and moderately effective against cavalry.
Language.String: Supports 12 population and spawns 2 Llamas when built.
Inca House that supports 12 population and spawns 2 Llamas when built.
Language.string: Receive a shipment of 1 villager for each Kancha House you have built.
TEAM 2 Warrior Priestesses
TEAM received 2 Warrior Priestesses.
3 Warrior Priestesses
Improves the speed and hitpoints of your War Chief. Additionally, your War Chief now resists against ranged damage.
Your War Chief now does greatly increased damage vs. cavalry and shock infantry.
Sends 24 Peruvian dogs and improves them in combat. Allows your Warchief and Kancha Houses to raise them. Additionally, you can train more Peruvian dogs.
Villager hitpoints and armor increased. Fishing Boats get less armor.
Tambos and Chasqui generate trickles of Experience.
Villagers gather all Food faster.
Receive a shipment of 2 Macemen for each military building you have built (Kallankas, War Huts, and Strongholds).
Villagers, Fishing Boats and Warships gather faster from animals and animal resources last longer.
Warrior Priestesses gain increased attack.
Warships are cheaper and gather from fish much more quickly and whales somewhat more quickly.
Warships and Fishing Boats move fast like Chinchillas and take less time to train.
The Chancas send 9 Macemen and increase their damage against infantry.
The Chachapoyas send 17 Huaracas and increase their attack range.
The Chincha ship 5 Chincha Rafts and increase their hitpoints.
The Colla send 17 Bolas Warriors and increase their ranged damage, especially against Heavy Cavalry and Heavy Shock Infantry.
Buildings gain increased line of sight and siege armor.

The Aymara send 5 Chasquis and greatly improve their hitpoints, speed, and line of sight. Chasquis now slow down nearby enemies and can enter stealth with no speed penalty. Increases the build limit for Chasquis.
The Cajamarca send 13 Jungle Bowmen and improve their bonus damage against heavy infantry. Additionally, Jungle Bowmen gain additional damage on their ranged attack and poison.
Kallankas get more hitpoints, build faster, train units more quickly, and cost no coin. Increases build limit.
Trade Monopoly is available an age early and is free.
Doubles the effectiveness of Llamas at the Community Plaza. Additionally, you can now train Llamas and they move more quickly.
Red Guard
Turns your Explorer into a powerful melee Duelist and ships an additional one from the Home City alongside a canine companion and 4 Surgeons. Additionally, Duelists gain a Heal ability.
Red Guards now move more quickly, cost a lesser amount of wood to train instead of food and gold, and are upgraded to guard status.
Delivers 4 Frontier Blockhouse Wagons. Your Settlers become Red Guards (Veteran Skirmishers), who can construct Torps, Blockhouses, and Military Buildings.
8 Karabiniers

<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Civilization bonus:</color>
Trains miners in addition to settlers. Torps replace houses and gather wood from nearby trees. Crates of Food are replaced by crates of Surstr√∂mming, which fatten over time. Jaeger and Black Rider mercenaries can always be recruited from the Tavern. All non-native mercenary shipments can be sent an infinite amount of times.
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Royal guard units:</color>Pikeman (Dalkarl) and Karabinier (Drabant)
<color=1.0, 1.0, 0.0>Unique units:</color>
Miner, Carolean, Leather Cannon and Karabinier

The Swedish Empire became one of the greatest in Europe through innovation in military tactics and logistics. Its artillery and cavalry charges dominated the battlefields, particularly during the Thirty Years War. Despite a relatively small population, the Swedes fielded some of the largest armies in Europe, partly through the recruitment of mercenaries.
Carolean
INF Carolean
Skirmisher
Swedish skirmisher with a powerful short-ranged attack. Can charge quickly with his sword equipped to counter heavy infantry. Good against Heavy Infantry and Light Cavalry.
5 Karabiniers
Karabinier
CAV Karabinier
Accurate mounted skirmisher with a long ranged attack. Good versus heavy infantry, light cavalry, and artillery.
Mounted skirmisher
Karabinier attack and hitpoints increased.
Veteran Karabiniers
Karabinier attack and hitpoints greatly increased.
Veteran Karabinier
1 Military Wagon and 1 Advanced Arsenal Wagon
All technogies and improvements (including Age Ups) are cheaper and research more quickly
Light affordable artillery that dies when it attacks, but does lots of damage to infantry and buildings.
TEAM Sends a wagon that transforms into a Torp to support more population and gather nearby resources. Villagers have increased yield from trees.
Pikemen and Halberdiers gain increased damage against Heavy Infantry, but take longer to be trained.
Jaegers and Black Riders can be hired from all military buildings and now cost a lesser amount of Wood to recruit instead of gold.
Savolax Mercenaries
Pikemen and Halberdiers gain the ability to charge for a brief speed boost.
Dalecarlian Offensive
Dalecarlian Offensive Shipment has arrived.
Hand Infantry / Hand Cavalry Combat
Hand Infantry / Hand Cavalry Combat Shipment has arrived.
TEAM All hand infantry and hand cavalry hitpoints increased.
TEAM Hand Infantry / Hand Cavalry Hitpoints
TEAM Hand Infantry / Hand Cavalry Shipment has arrived.

Grenadiers and Riflemen (Caroleans and Karabiniers) gain increased ranged damage. Grenadiers deal increased ranged damage to Heavy Infantry and Caroleans additionally deal increased ranged damage to Heavy Infantry and Light Cavalry.
TEAM Increases speed, hitpoints, and damage of all Ranged Cavalry.
The sturdy breed of Finnhorses improves the hitpoints of Hussars, Dragoons, and Karabiniers.
Carolean and Karabinier range and line-of-sight increased. Karabiniers additionally deal increased damage to light cavalry and Eagle Runner Knights.
Heavy Cannons, Horse Artillery, and Falconets take up one less population slot.

Your Explorer is upgraded to a powerful melee Duelist, giving him bonus damage, especially against heavy infantry, increased armor and health, splash damage, a powerful Heavy Strike ability, a melee charge ability, and a canine companion.
5 Leather Cannons
Delivers 1 Frigate. Frigates and Galleons no longer cost gold to train, but have an increased wood cost.
Delivers 4 Torp Wagons. Torps gain more hitpoints, can receive Home City shipments and gather from wood crates.
Grenadiers and Caroleans gain greatly increased hitpoints.
Swedish Pikeman attack, armor, and hitpoints greatly increased.
4 Leather Cannons
4 Karabiniers
5 Karabiniers
8 Karabiniers
10 Leather Cannons
Leather Cannons train faster and are cheaper.
Miners gather coin more quickly from mines and mines last longer for Miners, +1 Prospector Wagon.
Blueberries
Villagers gather from berries more quickly and bushes last longer. L√§ckert!
Blueberries Shipment has arrived.
5 Jaegers
Artillery now deal increased area damage (area of affect damage cap raised), but they now deal less damage to cavalry.

All Hussars transform into Karabiniers and enables Karabiniers to be trained in the Commerce Age.

Hussars deal more damage, especially to foot archers and skirmishers.

All Hussars are upgraded into Guard Bashkirs if not already. Ships 10 Guard Tatar Bolsheviks (Cavalry Archers) and allows you to train them. Unlocks shipments of Bashkirs and Tatar Bolsheviksfrom the Home City.

Ships 6 Miners and 1 Prospector Wagon and enables Miners and Proletarians at the Town Center.
Dictatorship of The Proletariat
Bombard Mode. Leather Cannons will take damage each time they fire a shot.
Fishmongers
